price: Yang demikian itu adalah Allah, Tuhan-mu, Pencipta segala sesuatu, tiada Tuhan (yang berhak disembah) melainkan Dia; maka bagaimanakah kamu dapat dipalingkan?
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālikumu al-lahu rabbukum khāliqu kulli shayin lā ilāha illā huwa fa-annā tu'fakūna
